snippet: The findings are the strongest indication yet that the student, Giulio Regeni, was killed by Egyptian security services.
abstract: Egyptian forensics official tells public prosecutor's office that autopsy has shown Italian student Giulio Regeni was interrogated for up to seven days before he was killed.
lead_paragraph: The findings are the strongest indication yet that the student, Giulio Regeni, was killed by Egyptian security services.

headline.main: Egypt: Autopsy Suggests Italian Student Was Subjected to Lengthy Interrogation
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Egypt: Autopsy Suggests Italian Student Was Subjected to Lengthy Interrogation
